players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to uncover any suspicious behavior."
You: "I agree with Charlie that we should keep a close eye on each other. It's important for us to work together and ensure trust within our group."
You: "I'd like to propose that we focus on building trust within our group and work together to uncover any suspicious behavior. Let's keep an open mind and communicate effectively with one another."

Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we all share our actions from the previous night. This will help us build trust and transparency within our group, allowing us to work together more effectively in identifying any suspicious behavior."

Diana: "I believe we should all share our actions from the previous night to build trust and transparency within our group. This will help us work together more effectively in identifying any suspicious behavior."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
